dmca.title: [ABUSE] The site http://aar.ru on your hosting breaks copyrights
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, August 09, 2005 10:25 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; support@mamadu.ru
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] The site http://aar.ru on your hosting breaks
copyrights]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] The site http://aar.ru on your hosting breaks copyrights
Date: Tue, 9 Aug 2005 13:06:43 +0400
From: Support@mamadu.ru <support@mamadu.ru>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Dear Support,

The site http://aar.ru (IP-address 70.85.136.36) on your hosting contains
pages which have been stolen from my site http://mamadu.ru The owner of a
site http://aar.ru has not worked at all to rename stolen pages!
It has simply replaced some colors and references to my site
http://mamadu.ru with references to his site http://aar.ru For example you
can see an identity of pages:

the stolen page: http://aar.ru
this page on my site: http://mamadu.ru

the stolen page: http://aar.ru/bbsestate.htm this page on my site:
http://mamadu.ru/bbsestate.htm

the stolen page: http://aar.ru/turizm.htm this page on my site:
http://mamadu.ru/turizm.htm

the stolen page: http://aar.ru/raspis1.htm this page on my site:
http://mamadu.ru/raspis1.htm

the stolen page: http://aar.ru/raspis.htm this page on my site:
http://mamadu.ru/raspis.htm

the stolen page: http://aar.ru/pogoda.htm this page on my site:
http://mamadu.ru/pogoda.htm

the stolen page: http://aar.ru/codes.htm this page on my site:
http://mamadu.ru/codes.htm

the stolen page: http://aar.ru/transl.htm this page on my site:
http://mamadu.ru/transl.htm

the stolen page: http://aar.ru/spravki.htm this page on my site:
http://mamadu.ru/spravki.htm

the stolen page: http://aar.ru/referats.htm this page on my site:
http://mamadu.ru/referats.htm

the stolen page: http://aar.ru/main.htm
this page on my site: http://mamadu.ru/main.htm

the stolen page: http://aar.ru/poisk.htm this page on my site:
http://mamadu.ru/poisk.htm

the stolen page: http://aar.ru/photo.htm this page on my site:
http://mamadu.ru/photo.htm etc.

My site exists since 2001 and the site http://aar.ru was registered
2004.09.22. You can to check up the registration information on
http://www.ripn.net:8082/nic/whois/en/index.html
You can look as my site looked on The Wayback Machine
http://web.archive.org/web/*/http://mamadu.ru

My site is well-known in the Russian Internet and occurrence of a site with
the pages stolen at me misleads users.
I ask you to remove a site http://aar.ru which contains the pages stolen at
me, from your hosting.

Best regards,
Konstantin Andriyanov
support@mamadu.ru
kostaa@softhome.net



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFC+MrXvK/XpJs6oyURAtMBAJ4lLjtUAETNyeQeSRHn85c8t/PxvACgqmJ0
yBVsIMqtMk/iRDeiZ2ACJrM=
=zUYm
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
